original_text: And he led me around among them, and behold, there were very many on the surface of the valley, and behold, they were very dry.
korean_text: 나를 그 뼈 사방으로 지나가게 하시기로 본즉 그 골짜기 지면에 뼈가 심히 많고 아주 말랐더라

sentences.original_text: And he led me around among them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나를 그들 가운데로 데리고 다니며

sentences.original_text: there were very many on the surface of the valley,
